mapper.select: select e.id, e.name,sh.to_year as toyear1, r.name as evaluation, r.rate as rate, s.salary as lastYearSalary, ((r.rate * 0.01 * s.salary)) as bonus, ( select salary from salary where id = s.id + 1 ) as thisYearSalary from salary_history as sh left join rating as r on sh.rating_id = r.id left join salary as s on sh.salary_id = s.id left join employees as e on sh.employees_id = e.id where e.id = #{id};
